analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#894-902):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#894-895)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#897)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#906-919):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#910-911)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#911-912)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#914)

DividendToken.claimDividend (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#557-571) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(dividendEndTime.sub(claimTimeout) > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#563-564)
	- require(bool)(dividendEndTime > 0) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#562)

DividendToken.updateDividend (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#592-602) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastUpdate[_hodler] < lastDividendIncreaseDate (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#595-602)

DividendToken.getClaimableDividend (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#605-614) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lastUpdate[_hodler] < lastDividendIncreaseDate (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#608-614)

DividendToken.requestUnclaimed (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#657-663) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= dividendEndTime.sub(claimTimeout)) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#660-661)

DividendToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#672-698) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(dividendEndTime < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#674-677)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#929-939) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#932-939)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#933-939)

RoundedTokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#979-998) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#986-998)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#988-998)

DividendToken.claimTimeout should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#518)
DividendToken.dividendCycleTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xaab606817809841e8b1168be8779eeaf6744ef64.sol#518-521)
